step_feedback.feedback: Good job on the first step! You performed the shoulder blade squeeze and circular motion well. Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back.
In step 2, focus on maintaining a smoother, controlled circular motion.  Try to keep your shoulders relaxed and avoid jerky movements.
Step 3 shows some inconsistency.  Concentrate on completing all four repetitions with the same controlled movement and deep breaths.

exercise_summary: You did a good job with the shoulder rolls exercise!  Remember to keep your movements smooth and controlled, and focus on deep breaths during each repetition.  Practice regularly to improve shoulder mobility and lymphatic flow.
